message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.DS

The paper discusses the use of network coding techniques in distributed storage systems, which involves coding and repair problems. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Information Theory (cs.IT), Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing (cs.DC), Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI), Systems and Control (cs.SY), or Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) sub-categories. Among these, cs.IT and cs.DC are the most likely sub-categories as they directly relate to the use of coding techniques and distributed systems. cs.NI is also likely as it deals with network traffic. cs.SY and cs.DS are less likely but still possible as they relate to systems and algorithms used in distributed storage.
